title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Strengthening Elementary AI Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational computer science concepts and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for preservice or in-service teachers. Online asynchronous course targeting preservice and elementary school teachers. Conducted in digital device (laptop/tablet) provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least 15 of the 22 elementary AI education competency items based on the TPACK framework in actual classes
Learners can design lesson plans incorporating AI technology, ethics, and data literacy
Learners can derive learner-level-tailored AI education approaches using survey and interview techniques
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
